name: Antivirus (Suri)
description:
Antivirus is a bullet hell style game. The objective of the game is to control the Antivirus and remove viruses that are attacking the Computer.

Game by Daniel Bizup

This is a remaster of a game I made for the Virginia Tech Gaming Project game jam in 2016.

Supported aspect ratios: 16x9, 4x3. There may be graphical issues on other aspect ratios.

V2.1 Changelog:

Reworked UI so that health, level, and charge bars will no longer become unaligned from the UI.

Corrected typo on the level select screen.
